description.lang: ZS5101US-5 detects vibrations made by an intruder attempting to break a window or door.It detects tamper situations and will send Z-Wave a signal when vibrations or tamper situations occur.When this device is securely included into the Z-Wave network, the above communications will be encrypted. * Non-Touch Vibration Design for Longer Lifetime* Adjustable Sensitivity* Tamper Switch* Battery Detection* LED Status Indicator* Battery Life: 2 Years
